message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.sql.Connection' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.murdermystery.utils.MessageUtils'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.sql.ResultSet' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.murdermystery.utils.MessageUtils'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.sql.SQLException' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.murdermystery.utils.MessageUtils'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.sql.Statement' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.murdermystery.utils.MessageUtils'.
Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - java.util.*.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.*' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.murdermystery.utils.MessageUtils'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.util.logging.Level' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.murdermystery.utils.MessageUtils'.
